title: Episode 307: All About Eggs
description: On an all new episode of Eat Your Words, host Cathy Erway is joined by Rachel Khong of Lucky Peach magazine to talk about one of the most important foods in the world: eggs! Rachel and the editors of Lucky Peach have laid it all out in their new All About Eggs cookbook, a veritable egg-cyclopedia of recipes and preparations for this incredible, edible food item.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
